name: Weather API wrapper
description: Darksky API wrapper, modified by ALEEF02 for AccuWeather. Required to avoid CORS error. Used in https://basicreact.com course.

ACCUWEATHER_CORE_API_KEY.description: Secret key to access AccuWeather Core API endpoints.

ACCUWEATHER_MINUTE_API_KEY.description: Secret key to access AccuWeather Minute API endpoint.
